item.title: 早间竞标从谈判桌上拿起筹码，寻求中国的澄清
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 美国官员称，科学在不断变化，人工智能安全难以掌控
item.description: 旨在为人工智能提出保障措施的政策制定者们正面临着一项艰巨的挑战：科学仍在不断发展。【原文：Policymakers aiming to recommend safeguards for artificial intelligence are facing a formidable challenge: science that is still evolving.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，激进投资者安森入股狮门影业，可能推动出售事宜
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周二援引该公司激进主义主管 Sagar Gupta的话报道，激进投资者 Anson Funds Management 已持有狮门影业的股份，并正敦促该公司考虑一系列选择，包括潜在的出售。【原文：Activist investor Anson Funds Management has taken a stake in Lionsgate Studios and is urging the company to consider a range of options, including a potential sale, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday, citing Sagar Gupta, the firm's head of activism.】

item.title: Blackstone 预计明年私募股权北美退出量将翻一番
item.description: 另类资产管理公司 Blackstone 的一位高层主管周二告诉路透社，随着通胀缓解和交易流量从低基数反弹，受 IPO 和并购活动增加的预期推动，预计其北美私募股权投资业务的退出量将在 2025 年翻一番。【原文：Alternative asset manager Blackstone expects exit volumes in its North America private equity business to double in 2025, driven by expectations of increased IPOs, and M&As activity, as inflation eases and deal flow rebounds from a low base, a top executive told Reuters on Tuesday.】

item.title: 通用汽车放弃开发 Cruise 机器人出租车
item.description: 汽车制造商通用汽车公司周二表示，其控股的 Cruise 业务将放弃开发机器人轴。【原文：Automaker General Motors said on Tuesday its majority-owned Cruise business will drop the development of robotaxis.】

item.title: GameStop 公布第三季度收入下降，原因是消费者减少消费
item.description: 本周二，视频游戏零售商 GameStop 公布第三季度收入下降，原因是随着消费者转向网络平台，实体店消费持续下滑。【原文：Videogame retailer GameStop reported a fall in third-quarter revenue on Tuesday, hit by a continued slump in spending at its brick-and-mortar stores as consumers shift to online platforms.】

item.title: 墨西哥下议院批准针对应用程序工人的劳动改革
item.description: 墨西哥下议院周二批准了一项改革，旨在规范为 DiDi、Rappi 和 Uber 等应用程序工作的外卖送餐员和司机的劳动条件，确保他们享有社会保障和圣诞奖金等福利。【原文：Mexico's lower house on Tuesday approved a reform that seeks to regulate labor conditions for delivery workers and drivers working for apps such as DiDi , Rappi and Uber by ensuring access to social security and a Christmas bonus among other benefits.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，阿迪达斯总部在长达数年的税务调查中遭到突袭
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周二报道，作为长达数年的税务调查的一部分，当局突袭了阿迪达斯德国总部。【原文：Authorities raided Adidas AG headquarters in Germany as part of a years-long tax investigation, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 礼来首席执行官称税收和监管改革、药品可负担性是特朗普执政的重点
item.description: 礼来公司首席执行官大卫-里克斯（David Ricks）周二在华盛顿经济俱乐部（Economic Club of Washington）表示，税收和监管改革以及药品可负担性是公司在特朗普第二任政府中的一些政策重点。【原文：Eli Lilly CEO David Ricks on Tuesday said at the Economic Club of Washington that tax and regulation reform and drug affordability were some policy focuses for the company in a second Trump administration.】

item.title: 经过一年的扩张，法航荷航对 2025 年的巴西市场充满信心
item.description: 法航荷航（Air France-KLM）在拉丁美洲最大经济体巴西的欧洲航空公司高管周二告诉记者，法航荷航今年在巴西取得了积极的业绩，因此对2025年的巴西市场持乐观态度。【原文：Air France-KLM is optimistic about the Brazilian market for 2025 after posting positive results in the country this year, executives for the European carrier in Latin America's largest economy told reporters on Tuesday.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，拜登计划阻止新日铁收购美国钢铁公司
item.description: 彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）周二援引知情人士的话报道称，美国总统乔-拜登（Joe Biden）计划在本月晚些时候以国家安全为由正式阻止新日本制铁公司（Nippon Steel）收购美国钢铁公司（U.S. Steel）的提议。【原文：U.S. President Joe Biden plans to formally block Nippon Steel's proposed takeover of U.S. Steel on national security grounds once the multi-billion dollar deal is referred back to him later this month, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 耶伦表示，特朗普的关税可能会破坏美国的通胀进程并提高成本
item.description: 美国财政部长珍妮特-耶伦（Janet Yellen）周二表示，她担心当选总统唐纳德-特朗普征收广泛进口关税的计划可能会破坏在抑制通胀方面取得的进展，并提高家庭和企业的成本。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen said on Tuesday she was worried that President-elect Donald Trump's plans to levy broad import tariffs could derail progress in quelling inflation and raise costs for households and businesses.】

item.title: 美国法院阻止克罗格 250 亿美元收购杂货竞争对手 Albertsons
item.description: 周二，一名美国法官阻止了美国连锁杂货店 Kroger KR.N 和 Albertsons 价值 250 亿美元的合并案，支持美国联邦贸易委员会的意见，为拜登政府赢得了胜利。【原文：A U.S. judge blocked the pending $25 billion merger of U.S. grocery chains Kroger KR.N and Albertsons on Tuesday, siding with the U.S. Federal Trade Commission in a win for the Biden administration.】

item.title: 报告将数据失误归咎于美国劳工部的统计领导层
item.description: 周二的一份报告称，美国劳工统计局的领导层应为该局今年的一系列失误负责，这些失误使该机构受到了严格的审查，报告指出，该局的不足之处包括对经济数据发布的关注不够、与用户的沟通不够以及没有提供足够的培训。【原文：The U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics' leadership was to blame for a series of missteps this year that put the agency under scrutiny, a report said on Tuesday, noting that its shortcomings included being insufficiently focused on economic data releases, communication with users and providing adequate training.】

item.title: 法拉利首席执行官表示，法拉利将始终在意大利生产汽车
item.description: 法拉利首席执行官贝内代托-维格纳（Benedetto Vigna）周二表示，法拉利将始终在其家乡意大利北部的马拉内罗生产豪华跑车，包括预计明年推出的首款全电动车型。【原文：Ferrari will always make its luxury sports car in its hometown of Maranello, northern Italy, including its first fully electric model expected next year, Chief Executive Benedetto Vigna said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，苹果明年将为智能手表引入卫星通信技术
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周二报道，苹果公司计划在 2025 年为其智能手表引入卫星连接，并正在加紧为该设备开发血压功能。【原文：Apple plans to bring satellite connections to its smartwatch in 2025 and is ramping up work on a blood-pressure feature for the device, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: PNC 称拥有核心零售存款的银行可能成为并购目标
item.description: PNC 金融服务集团首席执行官周二表示，该集团将在合适的市场上寻找拥有核心零售存款的银行进行并购，但会避开房地产风险较大的贷款机构。【原文：PNC Financial Services Group would look at banks with core retail deposits in the right markets for mergers and acquisitions, but would avoid lenders with heavy real estate exposure, its CEO said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 特朗普称在美投资 10 亿美元者将加速获得许可
item.description: 美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普周二表示，任何个人或公司在美国投资至少 10 亿美元，"都将获得全面加速的审批和许可，包括但不限于所有环境审批"。【原文：U.S. President-elect Donald Trump said on Tuesday that any person or company investing at least $1 billion into the U.S. "will receive fully expedited approvals and permits, including, but in no way limited to, all Environmental approvals."】

item.title: 瑞穗董事小林称企业不应对特朗普的关税威胁反应过度
item.description: 日本瑞穗金融公司（Mizuho Financial）、欧姆龙公司（Omron）和全日空公司（ANA）董事小林泉（Izumi Kobayashi）周二表示，企业不应对美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普威胁对中国商品加征关税做出过度反应。【原文：Izumi Kobayashi, director at Japan's Mizuho Financial, Omron, and ANA, said on Tuesday that companies should not overreact to President-elect Donald Trump's threats of imposing tariffs on Chinese goods.】

item.title: 牙膏制造商高露洁测试 "数字双胞胎 "新产品创意
item.description: 高露洁棕榄公司首席分析与洞察力官戴安娜-希尔德豪斯（Diana Schildhouse）周二在路透社 NEXT 小组会议上说，该公司正在向潜在消费者的 "数字双胞胎 "征求对可能推出的新产品的反馈意见。【原文：Colgate-Palmolive is soliciting feedback on possible new product from "digital twins" of prospective consumers, the company's chief analytics & insights officer Diana Schildhouse said on a Reuters NEXT panel on Tuesday.】

item.title: 摩根大通预计第四季度投资银行业务费用将增长 45
item.description: 摩根大通消费者和社区银行业务首席执行官玛丽安-莱克（Marianne Lake）周二表示，摩根大通第四季度的投资银行业务费用预计将比去年同期增长 45%。【原文：JPMorgan Chase investment banking fees are expected to rise by 45% in the fourth quarter over a year ago, Marianne Lake, the bank's CEO of consumer and community banking, said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 备忘录显示，瑞银计划调整在美国的财富管理业务
item.description: 据一份内部备忘录和周二的一份媒体报道，瑞银计划对其在美国的财富管理业务进行全面改革，将该业务拆分为六个部门，并更加关注非超级富豪客户。【原文：UBS plans to overhaul its wealth management business in the United States, splitting the operation into six divisions and focusing more on clients that are not super wealthy, according to an internal memo and a media report on Tuesday.】

item.title: 华平认为 2025 年私募股权交易将上升
item.description: 华平投资首席执行官杰弗里-帕尔曼（Jeffrey Perlman）周二在纽约路透社NEXT会议上接受采访时表示，受向投资者返还资本的压力推动，预计2025年和2026年私募股权投资行业的交易将大幅上升。【原文：Warburg Pincus expects a material uptick in deals in the private equity industry in 2025 and 2026, driven by pressure to return capital to their investors, its chief executive officer Jeffrey Perlman said in an interview at the Reuters NEXT conference in New York on Tuesday.】

item.title: 在汽车制造商挽救了供应商的工作岗位后，意大利希望与斯泰兰特改善关系
item.description: 意大利工业部长阿道夫-乌尔索（Adolfo Urso）周二宣布了一项协议，以避免斯泰兰特的供应商裁员 249 人，他表示希望这一突破将有助于修复与该汽车制造商的紧张关系。【原文：Italy's Industry Minister Adolfo Urso announced a deal on Tuesday to avert 249 layoffs at suppliers to Stellantis , saying he hoped the breakthrough would help repair strained relations with the carmaker.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，沃尔格林正与 PE 公司 Sycamore 商谈出售事宜
item.description: 华尔街日报》周二援引知情人士的话报道，沃尔格林博姿联盟正在与私募股权公司 Sycamore Partners 商谈出售事宜。【原文：Walgreens Boots Alliance is in talks to sell itself to private equity firm Sycamore Partners, the Wall Street Journal reported on Tuesday citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 阿达尼港口公司撤回科伦坡港口项目的 DFC 资金申请
item.description: 印度阿达尼港口和经济特区有限公司（Adani Ports and Special Economic Zone Ltd）周二表示，该公司将通过内部应计制和资本管理计划为其科伦坡港口码头项目融资，并撤回了向美国国际开发金融公司（DFC）提出的融资申请。【原文：India's Adani Ports and Special Economic Zone Ltd said on Tuesday it would finance its Colombo port terminal project through internal accruals and a capital management plan, withdrawing its request for funding from the U.S. International Development Finance Corp (DFC).】

item.title: 高盛首席执行官称 2025 年交易量可能超过 10 年平均水平
item.description: 高盛集团首席执行官大卫-所罗门（David Solomon）周二表示，明年的股票交易和并购交易量都有可能超过 10 年的平均水平。【原文：Goldman Sachs CEO David Solomon said on Tuesday that dealmaking in both equities, and mergers and acquisitions, could potentially exceed 10-year averages next year.】

item.title: 巴克莱计划大举招聘，推动私人银行业务和财富管理发展
item.description: 巴克莱的目标是增聘多达 100 名顾问，以推动其私人银行和财富管理业务的增长，但由于竞争激烈和进入成本高昂，巴克莱排除了进军美国的可能性。【原文：Barclays aims to hire up to 100 more advisers to drive growth in its private banking and wealth management business, but has ruled out a push into the United States because of heavy competition and high costs of entry.】

item.title: 哈里王子将在默多克报纸审判中出庭作证四天
item.description: 伦敦高等法院周二被告知，哈里王子在下月对鲁珀特-默多克（Rupert Murdoch）的新闻集团报纸（NGN）提起诉讼时，可能会在证人席上被默多克的律师盘问四天。【原文：Prince Harry could be quizzed for four days in the witness box by lawyers for Rupert Murdoch's News Group Newspapers (NGN) when his lawsuit against the publisher goes to trial next month, London's High Court was told on Tuesday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，特斯拉与印度 DLF 公司合作重启新德里展厅的寻找工作
item.description: 两位消息人士告诉路透社，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的特斯拉公司已重新开始在新德里寻找展厅空间，这是该公司在今年早些时候搁置投资计划后重新考虑进军印度市场的第一个迹象。【原文：Elon Musk's Tesla has resumed its search for showroom space in New Delhi, two sources told Reuters, in the first sign it is rethinking entering the Indian market after putting its investment plans on hold earlier this year.】
